verses.roman:
mūrcchita ha-iyā muñi paḍinu bhūmite
svapna-bhaṅga haila, dekhi, hañāche prabhāte

synonyms: mūrcchita ha-iyā—fainting; muñi—I; paḍinu—fell; bhūmite—on the ground; svapna-bhaṅga—breaking of the dream; haila—there was; dekhi—I saw; hañāche—there was; prabhāte—morning light.
translation: I fainted and fell to the ground, my dream broke, and when I regained consciousness I saw that morning had come.
